item.title: How to cheat at CSS
item.description: CSS is the language of design on the web. It’s used to control how everything looks. The styling of this text, how the article metadata (tags, authors etc) above this looks, everything.

item.title: The Dangers of CDN's
item.description: CDN’s are used a lot in web development to make things faster, and easier. But with everything there are pros and cons.
